objects.description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may stop or disable services on a system to render those services unavailable to legitimate users. On ESXi servers, monitor for suspicious commands that terminate VMs, such as `esxcli vm process kill`,  `pkill –9 vmx-*`, or `vim-cmd vmsvc/power.off `.(Citation: Crowdstrike Hypervisor Jackpotting Pt 2 2021)(Citation: Elastic Suspicious Termination of ESXI Process)(Citation: TrendMicro Play)
